programme.title: Strike One
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E05, While Doug's company is in strict negotiations, he decides to buy a brand new SUV.

programme.title: Strike Too
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E06, It is week two of the IPS strike, and Doug still has not gotten a job. To get back on his feet, his sister Stephanie get him a substitute teacher job at her school.

programme.title: Strike Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E07, Carrie and Kelly plan a get-together for Doug, Deacon and Arthur to keep them from going crazy during the strike.

programme.title: Dark Meet
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E08, Doug, Carrie and Arthur are thinking about the first Thanksgiving they (and Arthur's second wife Lily) spent together.

programme.title: Twisted Sitters
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E09, Doug and Carrie have to watch Deacon and Kelly's kids while they are out of town. When one of the kids sees them having sex, they have to find a way to keep him from saying anything.

programme.title: Work Related
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E10, When Arthur goes to Carrie's work he is offered a job there, which really begins to irritate her. Doug competes to be Mr. May for IPS but Deacon is in the way of him getting it.

programme.title: Better Camera
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E11, Doug buys Carrie a camera for christmas, but her office gives her a better one. Lou Ferigno moves in next door.

programme.title: Wedding Presence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E12, Doug and Carrie try to go to a wedding but not have to stay.

programme.title: Hi-Def Jam
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E13, Doug convinces his sister to go out with Carrie's boss so that he can go to his house to watch the Super Bowl on his high-def TV.

programme.title: Paint Misbehavin'
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E14, Doug makes Carrie tell him people she knows that she finds attractive, and she says Deacon. Deacon is having a birthday party at a paintball course and it turns into a war.

programme.title: Deacon Blues
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E15, Doug sees Deacon with another woman while he told Kelly he had to work late.

programme.title: Horizontal Hold
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E16, Carrie bans sex for two weeks because she's afraid she and Doug don't talk enough.

programme.title: Inner Tube
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E17, Doug lies to Carrie about having to work late so he can play mud football and get out of going to her seminar.

programme.title: Papa Pill
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E18, Doug feels sorry for Arthur and lets him go to a bar instead of a dance at his senior center. When Carrie finds out she gives Doug full control of Arthur, and Doug realizes how hard it is to deal with him.

programme.title: Package Deal
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E19, Doug receives an offer from FedEx and tells his IPS boss that if he wont give Doug a better route than he will transfer to FedEx.

programme.title: Seperation Anxiety
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E20, During Deacon and Kelly's separation, Doug and Carrie go out with Kelly and run into a guy, Bill, Carrie knows from work.

programme.title: Departure Time
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E21, Doug's parents are coming in town so Doug and Carrie decide to go and pick them up at the airport and they bring upsetting news to Doug.

programme.title: Swim Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E22, After a big storm Doug and Carrie catch their annoying neighbors in their backyard cleaning up. Then they give the idea to Doug and Carrie that they should tear down the wall dividing them and make it on big backyard.

programme.title: S'no Job
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E23, Danny's father Stu asks Doug to arrange a job interview for Danny at IPS. Doug however doesn't want Danny to work with him.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (1)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E24, Carrie discovers that she's pregnant, and she's panicked that the timing is wrong. Meanwhile, Deacon and Kelly begin to reconcile.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (2)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E25, Doug tells Carrie not to panic about having the baby, that he will take care of all her "burden," so he takes on a second job so that they can store a little extra money before the due date.

programme.title: Walk, Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E01, In an effort to spend more time with Carrie, Doug hires someone (Nicole Sullivan) to take Arthur for a walk three times a week.

programme.title: Sight Gag
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E02, Doug uses a two-for-one coupon to give Carrie a gift of corneal surgery which results in her temporary blindness.

programme.title: Mean Streak
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E03, Doug prepares to break the record for the most consecutive deliveries without incident; Arthur asks Holly to play in Scrabble tournament.

programme.title: Friender Bender
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E04, Doug and Carrie's friendship with Deacon and Kelly is tested after Doug is distracted and backs into their car.

programme.title: No Retreat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E05, Arthur is left to fend for himself when Doug and Carrie go on her company retreat with a group of boring lawyers.

programme.title: Ticker Treat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E06, Doug's Halloween decorations put Arthur in the hospital; Deacon doesn't like Kirby's choice of a Halloween costume.

programme.title: Lyin' Hearted
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E07, Doug runs into a business acquaintance while bringing Arthur to the hospital for heart surgery; Carrie discovers an old college acceptance letter.

programme.title: Life Sentence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E08, Doug and his friends become victims of reality TV when Doug sets up a camera in the basement to keep an eye on Arthur.

programme.title: Veiled Threat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E09, Doug and Carrie experience a flashback to their wedding day after finding a piece of wedding cake in their freezer.

programme.title: Oxy Moron
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E10, Doug tries to prove he would protect Carrie in a life-or-death situation after he makes a dumb move while on a rough plane ride.

programme.title: Depo Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E11, Carrie asks Doug to be a witness at her boss's trial, but then fears he won't be professional in the courtroom.

programme.title: Ovary Action
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E12, The holidays and Doug's parents descend on the household as Doug and Carrie attempt to conceive a baby.

programme.title: Food Fight
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E13, Carrie grows jealous when Spence's girlfriend (Christine Nelson) recruits Doug to test her culinary homework.

programme.title: Double Downer
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E14, Doug spoils Carrie's plans for a romantic weekend when he organizes an outing to Atlantic City -- and his boss ends up joining them.

programme.title: Dougie Nights
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E15, Doug becomes addicted to the night life after he agrees to go club hopping with Deacon to help snap him out of his depression.

programme.title: No Orleans
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E16, Doug and Carrie sneak off to New Orleans after having promised his cousins they would never travel there without them. Peter Scolari guest stars.

programme.title: Missing Links
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E17, Carrie and Doug try to find a date for Deacon so they can all golf together as a foursome at the country club.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E04, Carla and Eddie dismiss the unfortunate events that occurred before the wedding as just bad luck.

programme.title: The Crane Mutiny
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E05, Frasier tells his friends about a recent argument with Lilith.

programme.title: Paint Your Office
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E06, Norm agrees to paint Rebecca's office in return for running up his tab.

programme.title: The Last Angry Mailman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E07, Cliff tries to save his childhood home from getting bulldozed.

programme.title: Bidding On The Boys
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E08, Lilith gets back at Frasier for wanting her to sign a pre-nuptial agreement.

programme.title: Pudd'nhead Boyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E09, Woody finds a new admirer when he portrays Mark Twain as an understudy.

programme.title: A Kiss Is Still A Kiss
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E10, Sam encourages Rebecca to tell her boss she has a crush on him.

programme.title: My Fair Clavin
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E11, Cliff gives his girl a makeover and ends up losing her to every other guy.

programme.title: Christmas Cheers
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E12, Sam buys a last minute Christmas gift for Rebecca from another shopper.

programme.title: Woody For Hire Meets Norman Of The Apes
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E13, Robert Urich visits Cheers when Woody makes his television debut.

programme.title: And God Created Woodman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E14, Sam and Woody take the rap for Rebecca when she breaks a priceless vase.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Cuties
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E15, Carla gives birth to twins, a boy and girl. During Carla's absence, the bar hires two waitresses.

programme.title: Yacht Of Fools
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E16, Mr. Drake invites Sam and Rebecca for a weekend on his yacht. Rebecca still pines for Mr. Drake.

programme.title: To All The Girls I've Loved Before
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E17, Frasier second-guesses his wedding when the guys throw him a bachelor party.

programme.title: Let Sleeping Drakes Lie
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E18, Rebecca gets caught snooping in Evan's room when he returns from Europe early.

programme.title: Airport V
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E19, Eddie becomes an ice skater in a penguin suit for ice shows, and invites Carla to see the show in Seattle.

programme.title: The Sam In The Grey Flannel Suit
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E20, Rebecca learns Sam was promoted solely to help the softball team win.

programme.title: Our Hourly Bread
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E21, Woody and Sam want a raise, but the bar's takings have been declining for three months.

programme.title: Slumber Party Massacred
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E22, Carla's depressed when she learns she's going to be a grandmother.

programme.title: Bar Wars
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E23, Sam and his Cheers gang have lost 173 sporting competitions to their rival, Gary and Gary's Old Town Tavern.

programme.title: The Big Kiss-Off
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E24, Sam and Woody make a bet that they can kiss Rebecca before midnight.

programme.title: Back Seat Becky, Up Front
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E25, Rebecca finds out Evan is moving to Tokyo and bringing another woman along.

programme.title: How To Recede In Business
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E01, Lillian Corporation's new vice president fires Rebecca and rehires Sam as the bar's revival manager.

programme.title: Swear to God
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E02, Sam vows to be abstinent when he finds out he may have fathered a child.

programme.title: Executive Sweet
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E03, Sam traps Rebecca into declaring that she's in love with her boss.

programme.title: One Happy Chappy In A Snappy Serape
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E04, Rebecca pretends she's engaged to Sam when the bar owner proposes.

programme.title: Those Lips, Those Ice
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E05, Carla becomes jealous when she thinks Eddie is having an affair with a skater.

programme.title: Norm, Is That You
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E06, Norm discovers his hidden talent as a talented interior designer.

programme.title: How To Win Friends And Electrocute People
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E07, Cliff has appendicitis, but the gang are more interested in Frasier and Lilith's planned countrywide trip.

programme.title: Jumping Jerks
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E08, After watching The Magnificent Seven, Woody, Cliff, and Norm decide to seek thrills.

programme.title: Send In The Crane
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E09, Sam reunites with his lost love and ends up falling for her daughter!

programme.title: Bar Wars II: The Woodman Strikes Back
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E10, Sam and the Cheers gang lie, cheat and steal to win a drink-making contest.

programme.title: Adventures In Housesitting
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E11, Rebecca panics when her boss's dog runs away while in her care.

programme.title: Wisconsin Fireball
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Wisconsin Fireball, S02E05, The guys are on their way to the Northeast Astronomy Forum in New York for a personal appearance, when a large fireball is seen over rural Wisconsin. Geoff continues on to NEAF to hold down the fort, while Steve begins an all-night drive to the fall site.

programme.title: Sweden
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Sweden, S02E06, Geoff and Steve cross the Arctic Circle on one of their most daring expeditions yet. With the help of a Swedish meteorite-hunting family, the guys attempt to uncover ancient space rocks that were transported by glaciers during the last Ice Age.

programme.title: Australia 2: Mundrabilla
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Australia 2: Mundrabilla, S02E07, Steve and Geoff head on an ambitious expedition. On the far side of the world, they cross the Nullarbor Plainand reach the remote Mundrabilla strewnfield. They team up with Australian meteorite specialist Dr. Andy Tomkins.

programme.title: Australia 1: Henbury Craters
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Australia 1: Henbury Craters, S02E08, In the Season Two finale Geoff and Steve journey to one of the most remarkable meteorite sites on the planet—the Henbury Crater field in central Australia.

programme.title: Pultusk, Poland
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Pultusk, Poland, S03E01, In this episode, Geoff and Steve travel over 6,000 miles to eastern Poland in hopes of securing a piece of one of the most famous meteorite falls in history.

programme.title: Morasko, Poland
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Morasko, Poland, S03E02, 5,000 years ago, an enormous meteorite cascaded over Poland scarring the landscape with seven massive craters. For the first time, Geoff and Steve receive exclusive access to investigate the magnificent Morasko crater field.

programme.title: Return to Sweden
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Return to Sweden, S03E03, On this episode, Geoff and Steve make their epic return to northern Sweden in order to reclaim victory north of the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Dronino, Russia
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Dronino, Russia, S03E04, The Kremlin, St. Basil's Cathedral, the Red Square, and of course, shots of vodka... for the first time, Geoff and Steve make the journey to Russia in search of one of the most rare and valuable meteorites on the planet—the Dronino ataxite.

programme.title: Homestead
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Homestead, S03E05, Geoff and Steve set out to uncover a forgotten extraterrestrial treasure from the cornfields of Amana, Iowa. On February 12, 1875 the legendary "detonating space rock" hurled through the air and exploded six times over the farm fields of Iowa.

programme.title: Return to Whitecourt
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Return to Whitecourt, S03E06, An important scientific mission summons the Meteorite Men back to Canada.

programme.title: Mojave
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Mojave, S03E07, Geoff and Steve venture to one of the country's meteorite capitals: Arizona, home of over 93 different space rocks. To better understand this phenomenon, the guys investigate the Mecca of meteorites, Franconia.

programme.title: Sahuarita, Arizona
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Sahuarita, Arizona, S03E08, A hot tip sends the guys to southern Arizona in order to investigate a possible cold find.

programme.title: Brenham, Kansas
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Brenham, Kansas, S01E01, In Brenham, Kansas pieces of a large meteorite that fell thousands of years ago have been unearthed. Using advanced metal detection equipment Arnold and Notkin work tirelessly to find the meteorite pieces that have yet to be discovered.

programme.title: The Tucson Ring
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: The Tucson Ring, S01E02, In the 1850s a farmer came across a meteorite in Arizona; it's known as the "Tucson Ring" and now resides at the Smithsonian. Arnold and Notkin search for more pieces in an attempt to solve one of the biggest mysteries in the world of meteorite hunters.

programme.title: The Odessa Iron Meteorite
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: The Odessa Iron Meteorite, S01E03, Approximately 50,000 years ago a giant meteor created one of only two craters in the U.S. that have produced meteorite specimens. In this episode, Steve and Geoff will be hunting on the land surrounding the crater with their new cutting-edge detectors.

programme.title: West, Texas
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: West, Texas, S01E04, Ash Creek is the site of the most recent recorded meteorite fall in United States (February 15, 2009). In this episode, Geoff and Steve will follow clues provided by the locals to uncover the mysterious rocks of this fall.

programme.title: Gold Basin
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Gold Basin, S01E05, In 1995, Professor Jim Kriegh discovered a field of of ancient stone meteorites; the Gold Basin Meteorite is known as the best mapped strewn field in history. In this episode, Geoff and Steve get exclusive access to hunt meteorites in uncharted areas.

programme.title: Buzzard Coulee & Whitecourt Crater
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Buzzard Coulee & Whitecourt Crater, S01E06, In Canada, Geoff and search for pieces of the Buzzard Coulee Meteorite. Also, the meteorite hunters receive a surprise invitation to visit the newly discovered, and highly protected, Whitecourt Crater and hunt the surrounding area.

programme.title: Dry Lake Bed
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Dry Lake Bed, S01E07, Dry lake beds are a great place to find never before discovered meteorites. In this episode, the terrain of the bed provides spectacular visuals and high-speed action as Geoff and Steve cover as much ground as possible, looking for dark rocks.
